statements: SELECT * FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance;
SELECT maintenance_id, company_id, maintenance_date FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_notes FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled'
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance WHERE company_id = '123'
SELECT * FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) FROM UtilityCompanyMaintenance GROUP BY maintenance_type
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_date, description FROM maintenance_records WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, task_description, duration_hours FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01' AND schedule_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT description, maintenance_date, staff_id FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE staff_id = 2 ORDER BY description ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE staff_id = 123;
SELECT description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_description, duration_hours FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE description LIKE '%inspection%' AND staff_id IN (456, 789);
SELECT schedule_date, task_description, duration_hours FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE duration_hours > 2 AND schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Calibration' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, scheduled_date FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_schedules ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_schedules.equipment_id ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01' AND scheduled_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY maintenance_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type IN ('Laboratory Equipment', 'Industrial Machinery') ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UtilityCompany;
SELECT company_id, company_name FROM UtilityCompany ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT company_id, COUNT(equipment_id) AS total_equipment FROM MaintenanceRecord GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type, installation_date FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM UtilityCompany;
SELECT company_name FROM UtilityCompany WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_type, installation_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY installation_date DESC;

SELECT company_name, equipment_type, schedule_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule JOIN UtilityCompany ON MaintenanceSchedule.company_id = UtilityCompany.company_id JOIN Equipment ON MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id = Equipment.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date FROM equipment ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT m.*, s.status FROM maintenance_records m JOIN maintenance_schedules s ON m.equipment_id = s.equipment_id;
SELECT DISTINCT technician_name, contact_number FROM technicians;
SELECT description FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
